description: An example resource schema demonstrating some basic constructs and validation rules.

Name.description: Specifies the identifier for the database; must be unique for your account.

DataRetentionTimeInDays.description: Specifies the number of days for which Time Travel actions can be performed on the database.

MaxDataExtensionTimeInDays.description: The maximum number of days for which Snowflake can extend the data retention period for tables in the database.

DefaultDdlCollation.description: Specifies a default collation specification for all schemas and tables added to the database

Comment.description: Specifies a comment for the database.
